import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Card, Image, ListGroup, Button, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../Components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const product=products.find(p=>p.id===match.params.id) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 value={product.rating} text={`${product.numReviews} reviews`} Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.des} ) } export default ProductScreen
